rows.label: tlk44300181_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Those eyes look like the eyes of a
soul seeking a ballad, am I right?

rows.label: tlk44300181_01_msg0002
rows.name: But I'm afraid I can't sing for you alone.

rows.label: tlk44300181_01_msg0003
rows.name:
The Ballad of Adel's Embercakes
is particularly popular right now.

rows.label: tlk44300181_01_msg0004
rows.name:
You know embercakes? They're selling
like hotcakes at Lectica Vegetables.
It's one of Teos Aure's specialties!

rows.label: tlk44300181_01_msg0005
rows.name:
They say it was Adel's favorite
food, and that he would always eat
one before battle.

rows.label: tlk44300181_01_msg0006
rows.name:
The saying goes that a Driver who can
stomach spicy food will be equally as
strong in battle.
